subject: Baseball
Agents (Business)
lead_paragraph: Greg Maddux will be inducted into the Hall of Fame this year, the first longtime client of the agent Scott Boras to be enshrined in Cooperstown, N.Y.
snippet: Greg Maddux will be inducted into the Hall of Fame this year, the first longtime client of the agent Scott Boras to be enshrined in Cooperstown, N.Y.
